markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Limited">[Hookclaw Digger](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=208)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Little Trouble in Big Absalom](/Sources.aspx?ID=53) pg. 0</row>

**Prerequisites**  Kobold  ancestry

</column>

You are a digger from the Hookclaw kobold tribe, born beneath the streets of Absalom, with muscles and mind hardened by years spent tunneling through rock and earth and a confidence built upon your pride in your draconic heritage.

 Choose two ability boosts. One must be to **Strength** or **Charisma**, and one is a free ability boost.

 You're trained in the [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) skill, the [Mining Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) skill, and the [Engineering Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) skill. You gain the [Improvise Tool](/Feats.aspx?ID=2131) skill feat.
name: Hookclaw Digger

text: Hookclaw Digger Source Little Trouble in Big Absalom pg. 0 Prerequisites Kobold ancestry You are a digger from the Hookclaw kobold tribe, born beneath the streets of Absalom, with muscles and mind hardened by years spent tunneling through rock and earth and a confidence built upon your pride in your draconic heritage. Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Strength or Charisma , and one is a free ability boost. You're trained in the Crafting skill, the Mining Lore skill, and the Engineering Lore skill. You gain the Improvise Tool skill feat.
